summary.span: 表示所有值都必須是唯一的資料行集限制。

span.span: Represents a restriction on a set of columns in which all values must be unique.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 確保主索引鍵值是唯一的單一資料行 （或資料行） 上強制執行。The is enforced on a single column (or columns) to ensure that a primary key value is unique. 條件約束不會強制執行除非屬性設定為`true`。Constraints are not enforced unless the property is set to `true`. 當會與第二個合併，條件約束不會強制執行直到完成所有的合併。When the a is merged with a second , constraints are not enforced until all merges are completed. ## Examples 下列範例會將要並設定屬性設`true`。The following example adds a to a and sets the property to `true`. [!code-vb[Classic WebData UniqueConstraint Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData UniqueConstraint Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

threadsafe.span: 此類型是適用於多執行緒的讀取作業。

span.span: This type is suitable for multithreaded read operations.

threadsafe.span: 您必須同步處理任何寫入作業。

span.span: You must synchronize any write operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式提供在 Visual Studio.NET 環境中的設計階段支援。This constructor is provided for design time support in the Visual Studio .NET environment. 接著必須透過 ，將使用此建構函式建立的 物件加入至集合中。 objects created by using this constructor must then be added to the collection via . 具有指定名稱的資料行必須存在於呼叫方法時，或如果呼叫之前呼叫這個建構函式，指定名稱的資料行都必須存在時，呼叫。Columns with the specified names must exist at the time the method is called, or if has been called prior to calling this constructor, the columns with the specified names must exist at the time that is called.

.property instance bool IsPrimaryKey
Public ReadOnly Property IsPrimaryKey As Boolean

member this.IsPrimaryKey : bool

summary.span: 取得數值，指示條件約束是否在主索引鍵上。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether or not the constraint is on a primary key.

value.span: 如果條件約束在主索引鍵上，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: , if the constraint is on a primary key; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資料表通常會包含可確保每個資料列是唯一的主索引鍵。A table usually includes a primary key that ensures every row is unique. 在某些資料表中，主索引鍵可能會組成多個資料行。In some tables, the primary key may be made up of more than one column. 例如，含有名稱之資料表的主索引鍵可能會由這兩個的第一個和最後一個名稱以及。For example, a primary key for a table containing names might be made up of both the first and last names as well. 若要建立多個資料行主要金鑰，請將屬性資料行設 DataColumn 物件的陣列。To create a primary key with more than one column, set the Columns property to an array of DataColumn objects. ## Examples 下列範例會檢查屬性。The following example checks the property. [!code-vb[Classic WebData UniqueConstraint.IsPrimaryKey Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData UniqueConstraint.IsPrimaryKey Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
